description: Returns a list of service accounts for a workspace. Service accounts are only available for workspaces that are compatible with Grafana version 9 and above.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace for which to list service accounts.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of service accounts.

nested_items.name: serviceAccounts
nested_items.description: An array of structures containing information about the service accounts.

nested_items.name: grafanaRole
nested_items.description: The role of the service account, which sets the permission level used when calling Grafana APIs.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the service account.

nested_items.name: isDisabled
nested_items.description: Returns true if the service account is disabled. Service accounts can be disabled and enabled in the Amazon Managed Grafana console.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the service account.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The workspace to which the service accounts are associated.
